page.title: 09 COMPUTERS
page.content: In{Askern}the most popular computer was the{Spectrum.}Out of nine people, four people had a{Spectrum,}but only one out of the four people used his computer for work. However he said he did not depend on it. The other three used their computers for leisure uses. The other five were all different computers. One which was called the{Epsem}was used for work and the people who worked on it depended on it. The other four were{Commodore {64, Acorn, Commodore, Vic 20}and the { {Amstrad. }The{Amstrad}was used for work and leisure. We found that most computers are used for leisure, but some are used for work. Out of the three that are used for work only one was depended on and that was the { {Chemist's}shop.
